alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:01AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lauderdale County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1201 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walnut Grove, or 12 miles northeast of J P Coleman State Park, moving east-southeastward at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Underwood-Petersville, Wright, Zip City, Threet and Oakland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
